short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pick the nearest Tailwind color from any website, Compare with Tailwind colors, Copy Tailwind classes.
short.es: Elige el color Tailwind más cercano de cualquier sitio web, compara con colores Tailwind, copia clases Tailwind.
short.fr: Sélectionnez la couleur Tailwind la plus proche depuis n'importe quel site web, Comparez avec les couleurs Tailwind, Copiez les…
short.it: Scegli il colore Tailwind più vicino da qualsiasi sito web, Confronta con i colori Tailwind, Copia le classi Tailwind.
short.ja: 任意のウェブサイトから最も近いTailwindカラーを選択、Tailwindカラーと比較、Tailwindクラスをコピー。
short.ko: 어떤 웹사이트에서도 가장 가까운 Tailwind 색상을 선택하고, Tailwind 색상과 비교하며, Tailwind 클래스를 복사하세요.
short.pl: Wybierz najbliższy kolor Tailwind z dowolnej strony internetowej, porównaj z kolorami Tailwind, kopiuj klasy Tailwind.
short.ru: Выберите ближайший цвет Tailwind с любого веб-сайта, сравните с цветами Tailwind, скопируйте классы Tailwind.
short.zh_CN: 从任何网站选择最近的 Tailwind 颜色，与 Tailwind 颜色进行比较，复制 Tailwind 类。
short.zh_TW: 從任何網站選擇最近的 Tailwind 顏色，與 Tailwind 顏色進行比較，複製 Tailwind 類。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Chrome Extension Text Resources

## Extension Name and Description
- Name: Nearest Tailwind Color Picker
- Description: Pick colors from any website, find matching Tailwind colors, and copy class names.

## Features
- Pick colors using eyedropper tool
- Find closest matching Tailwind CSS colors
- Copy Tailwind utility class names
- Drag and drop to reorder colors
- Compare selected vs Tailwind colors

## Required Permissions
- `activeTab`: Required for eyedropper tool to access webpage colors
- `scripting`: Needed to inject color extraction scripts
